title: Skirt
description: wrap accordian pleated skirt; 4 1/2\" blue waistband with long ties; body of skirt is blue on white tie-dyed with center horizontal 2 1/2\" band in geometric batik pattern; very narrow white braid sewed to pleats below waistband
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
